title: Loving Hut - Tanjung Duren
typeOfFood: Vegan, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, Indonesian
description: Part of an international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serving all vegan food (including desserts), coffee and non-alcoholic beverages. Each location is individually family owned.
streetAddress: Jl Tanjung Duren Utara IV No 230a
